attributes.action: Reject the referendum result to leave the EU
attributes.additional_details: If the process leading to the referendum has been flawed and the voting is not based on sound judgment by the public, you cannot rely on the result to reflect the true will of the voters. The options are to reject the referendum or to have a second referendum now that the truth is becoming clearer after the event.
attributes.background: Politicians defined the need for a referendum to leave the EU. They have defined the rules and have failed to guide the public; in fact they have misled/not informed the public. Many people as a result have regretted their decision. As such, the result does not reflect the true will of the people.

rejection.details:
We think you might want similar action to this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/133606
